title: I got hacked and proved that I was the original creator BUT
body:
Once i proved i was the creator i got a email saying that i would have a email sent to my email with instructions on how to reset the password. I never got the email. I've tried to email them back and ask if they forgot or if something went wrong, but nothing in return. I have called riot, but the person who answered told me to wait and its been 3 days. Please help thank you. the account name below
 the account that got hacked was RivenSpeed

replies.body: Thank You so much. I think the account may be permabanned and that's why they didn't send me a link back. Im thinking this because one day while i was on this account I saw that my hacked account was online and i began talking to him and all he kept saying was ill give you the password when its permabanned, because all game i spam racism and abuse. I have picture proof of this and would like to know if it is. Thanks again

I went ahead and found your ticket, and it looks like you have replied to it a number of times without a response.  The best advice I can give is to be patient!  The more you "bump" your ticket, the longer it will take to get a reply since we answer tickets from oldest to most recent.  We'll get back to you and figure out what happened and why the email wasn't received.

Sit tight, we're on it!
